CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01C02

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.CONTACT_POINT: Division des achats et de la commande publique

TITLE.P: Consultancy services for technical assistance to the electricity and geothermal sectors, Dominica

SHORT_DESCR.P: With the support of AFD, the GoCD has secured a grant from the European Union's Caribbean investment facility (CIF) aimed at providing technical assistance in the development of the Roseau valley geothermal resources and more specifically of the Dominica geothermal development company. This grant will be used in part for the funding of the present consultancy services assignment supporting DGDC.

TITLE.P: Lot 1 Support to the Electricity Regulator (IRC) and the Geothermal Advisory Committee

SHORT_DESCR.P: Support to the electricity regulator (IRC) and the Geothermal advisory committee.

CRITERIA_CANDIDATE.P: Applicants will be shortlisted according to the following criteria:
— Experience in the development and management of geothermal industrial projects as a consultant or a developer (20 %),
— Experience in procurement of services following DFI’s institutions guidelines and best practices (15 %),
— Experience in the PPA evaluation and negotiation, as well as concession agreements (30 %) • Experience in strategic capacity building (25 %),
— Experience in Small island developing states or Developing countries (10 %).

TITLE.P: Lot 2 Support to the domestic geothermal company (Dominica Geothermal Development Company, DGDC)

SHORT_DESCR.P: Support to the electricity regulator (IRC) and the Geothermal advisory committee.

CRITERIA_CANDIDATE.P: — Experience in the development and management of geothermal industrial projects as a consultant or a developer (40 %)
— Experience in management systems (HR, HSE, Operational Health and Safety) (20 %)
— Experience in procurement of services following DFI’s institutions guidelines and best practices (15 %)
— Experience with monitoring and administering World bank environmental and social safeguards(15 %)
— Experience in Small island developing states or Developing countries (10 %).

TITLE.P: Lot 3 Feasibility study for resilience of the transmission network

SHORT_DESCR.P: Feasibility study for resilience of the transmission network.

CRITERIA_CANDIDATE.P: — Experience in procurement of services following DFI’s institutions guidelines and best practices (15 %)
— Experience in feasibility studies in the electricity sector (40 %),
— Experience in feasibility studies for resilient transmission interconnections (30 %)
— Experience in Small island developing states or Developing countries (15 %).

SUITABILITY.P: List and brief description of conditions:

— application letter DC1 (see attachment or form available at the following address: http://www.economie.gouv.fr/daj/formulaires-declaration-du-candidat), or equivalent (A letter, dated and signed by a person having authority to represent the company, presenting the candidature, indicating whether it is presented by a company or by a consortium of jointly and severally liable companies

— size and composition of the applicant group shall be submitted — and each member must present the following documents); If the applicant is applying as one member of a consortium, the applicant must provide proof that each of the associated independent contractors or companies will put all necessary means at the applicant's disposal during the execution of the assignment.
— a copy of the extract of the registration in the Register of companies - 'Kbis' in France or equivalent (legal status, etc.) — less than 3 months old.

In the event of judicial reorganization procedure, a copy of any judgement to this effect; — An official declaration that the candidate is not in any of the circumstances referred to in articles 45 and 48 of the Executive Order 2015- 899 published on the 23.7.2015 in the 'Journal Officiel de la République Française' and a Statement of Integrity (appended to this letter).
— In case of identified sub-contractors, for each of them the candidate (or representative of the consortium) shall present:

—— A letter, dated and signed by a person having authority to represent the company and by a person having authority to represent the sub-contractor; presenting: — the sub-contractor; — the subcontracted service and its amount; — An official declaration that the subcontractor is not in any of the circumstances referred to in articles 45 and 48 of the Executive order 2015- 899 of 23.7.2015.

—— A dated and signed certificate indicating how the candidate would contract all declared sub-contractors to execute the relevant tasks for the project. It is specified that a candidate could request that capacity of sub-contractors could be taken into account to appreciate his application (or those of the consortium). In that case, each sub-contractor would provide all documents mentioned below.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: — A statement of the applicant’s gross revenue for the most-recent past three years and a detail of revenue from consulting services featured in this request for EOI.
— A proof of a valid professional insurance from an insurance company.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: — A list of the main relevant consulting services delivered during the last three years, detailing their value and date, sorted by private — or public — sector customer. Delivery of consulting services should be proven by customer statements or, lacking those, by a sworn statement from the applicant;
— A statement of your average annual workforce and number of managerial staff employed during the last 3 years;
— indication of the educational and professional qualifications of the management of the consultants firm / company, in particular the persons in charge of the bid.

PERFORMANCE_CONDITIONS.P: A copy of the certificates referred to in Article 51 of the Decree Nº 2016-360 of 25.3.2016 or an affidavit duly dated and signed by a person empowered to represent the company attesting that the candidate is up to date with its tax obligations and social services in its country of incorporation.

INFO_ADD.P: The applicant must also provide proof that each of the associated independent contractors or companies will put all necessary means at the applicant's disposal during the execution of the assignment. Economic operators can participate in the Call of interest on their own or in groups. An applicant shall submit one single application on its own or as a member of one single group. The files shall be sent by platform achatpublic.com For downloading operations, please refer to the technical documentation available at: — https://www.achatpublic.com

— invited to take account of the vagaries of electronic transmission. They shall ensure that the electronic transmission of their folder is complete and fully completed before the deadline for submission of application,
— authorized to transmit a backup copy either by electronic means (USB stick or CD preferentially) or by paper means.

The backup copies must be transmitted in sealed envelopes bearing clearly marked "backup copy and do not open before the deadline for submission of application" and reach the French development agency before the deadline for receipt of the tenders. These backup copies must be hand-delivered against receipt on working days, from Monday to Friday, from 09:00 to 12:00 (Paris time) and from 14:00 to 16:00 (Paris time) atthe following address: French development agency. Mail office to the attention of SGN/DCP. Réf: DCP-2018-062. 5, rue Roland Barthes, 75598, Paris cedex 12 Here are our recommendations to make a deposit fold on our platform dematerialization:
— check the presence of Java on the workstation (available free of charge on the site java.com-version 7 or 8),

— with an ADSL connection, the company must allow 3 hours or 4 hours for a crease of approximately 300 MB. And 6 hours or more if the fold exceeds 300Mo (the transmission of a ply depends on the performance of thecomputer station used, Network quality as well as Internet throughput),
— advocate the use of an Ethernet cable to access the Internet and avoid Wifi,
— privilege the location of the files locally and avoid the file server on the internal network of the company,
— the company going through a proxy will have to check with his IT department beforehand if no quota is set up for the uploading of the files,
— the IT department must also check the setting of the antivirus and firewall on the user station,
— the presence of the IT department during the creation and transmission of the fold is strongly recommended.
